subtitle-success: You can now log in to your account.
subtitle-invalid: The verification link is invalid or has already been used.
subtitle-expired: This verification link has expired. You can request a new one below or by logging in again.
subtitle-expired-no-email: This verification link has expired. Please try logging in again to request a new one
resend-successful: A new verification email has been sent to your inbox.
resend-failed: We couldn't resend the verification email. Please try again later.
